entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a wizard who attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. (Excerpt: 'Harry Potter must stay where he is safe... Harry Potter goes back to Hogwarts...')

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: A house-elf who is warning Harry about the plot at Hogwarts. (Excerpts: 'Dobby has known it for months...', 'Harry Potter must not put himself in peril.')

entities.name: hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry
entities.description: A magical school where Harry attends. (Excerpt: 'Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry this year')

relationships.description: Dobby is warning Harry about the plot at Hogwarts. (Excerpt: 'Dobby has known it for months...')

relationships.entity_2: hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry
relationships.description: Harry attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. (Excerpt: 'Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry this year')
